eventDecorators.name: NewRepo
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: NewAppProxy
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: ScriptResult
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: RecoverToVault
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

functionDecorators.name: newRepoWithVersion
functionDecorators.description: Create new repo in registry with `_name` and publish a first version with contract `_contractAddress` and content `@fromHex(_contentURI)`.

parameterDecorators.name: _dev
parameterDecorators.description: Address that will be given permission to create versions.

parameterDecorators.name: _initialSemanticVersion
parameterDecorators.description: Semantic version for new repo version.

parameterDecorators.name: _contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: address for smart contract logic for version (if set to 0, it uses last versions' contractAddress).

parameterDecorators.name: _contentURI
parameterDecorators.description: External URI for fetching new version's content.

functionDecorators.name: getRecoveryVault
functionDecorators.description: Get the recovery vault for the app.

functionDecorators.name: allowRecoverability
functionDecorators.description: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Token address that would be recovered.

functionDecorators.name: transferToVault
functionDecorators.description: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds, but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

functionDecorators.name: canPerform
functionDecorators.description: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app.

functionDecorators.name: newRepo
functionDecorators.description: Create new repo in registry with `_name`.

parameterDecorators.name: _dev
parameterDecorators.description: Address that will be given permission to create versions.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: NEEDS CREATE_NAME_ROLE and POINT_ROOTNODE_ROLE permissions on registrarInitialize this APMRegistry instance and set `_registrar` as the ENS subdomain registrar. Initialize can only be called once. It saves the block number in which it was initialized.

parameterDecorators.name: _registrar
parameterDecorators.description: ENSSubdomainRegistrar instance that holds registry root node ownership.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxyPinned
functionDecorators.description: Create a new pinned app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId` and initialization payload `_initializePayload`.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxy
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId`.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxy
functionDecorators.description: Create a new upgradeable app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId` and initialization payload `_initializePayload`.

functionDecorators.name: newAppProxyPinned
functionDecorators.description: Create a new pinned app instance on `_kernel` with identifier `_appId`.
